ModMetaData.name: AOTC: True Pinnacle of Creation[Continued]
ModMetaData.author: Para0234
ModMetaData.description:
This mod is an official addon for Ambition of the Cosmic that adds a fourth, hilariously overpowered generation of technologies
New creator's note : I took over the mod after Explodoboy announced that he would no longer be keeping the mod up-to-date due to no longer having the time to do so.
